General.Name: AKA Brands Holding Corp
General.Description: a.k.a. Brands Holding Corp. operates a portfolio of online fashion brands in the United States, Australia, New Zealand, and internationally. The company offers streetwear apparel, dresses, tops, footwear, headwear, wardrobe staples, and accessories through its online stores under the Princess Polly, Petal & Pup, Culture Kings, and mnml brands. It also operates physical stores. The company was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California. a.k.a. Brands Holding Corp. is a subsidiary of New Excelerate, L.P.
General.Address: 100 Montgomery Street, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94104
